influencers.name: Linda Sarsour
influencers.description: Political activist and co-chair of the Women's March.

influencers.name: Omar Offendum
influencers.description: Syrian-American hip-hop artist and peace advocate.

influencers.name: Ahed Tamimi
influencers.description: Palestinian activist known for her role in the resistance movement.

influencers.name: Malala Yousafzai
influencers.description: Pakistani activist for female education and the youngest Nobel Prize laureate.

influencers.description: Swedish environmental activist focused on climate change.

influencers.name: Khalid
influencers.description: American singer-songwriter known for hits like 'Young Dumb & Broke.'

influencers.name: Emma Watson
influencers.description: British actress and UN Women Goodwill Ambassador.
